name: Grayter Wikipedia
description: Initial version (1.0) is here! Standard serif fonts. More appropriate font sizes. Greater line spacing and paragraph spacing. All to increase the ease of reading Wiki pages.
additional_info:
v1.0
Initial public release. Features: Serif font, 1rem text size for paragraphs, greater line spacing and paragraph spacing. All to increase the ease of reading Wiki pages. 2015-10-13
